languages.text: "Лишь став кровью флагмана можно отыскать священный храм Неумирающего. Я не могу провести тебя этой стезей. Но могу сопровождать в пути".
"You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."
languages.original_text: "Лишь став кровью флагмана можно отыскать священный храм Неумирающего. Я не могу провести тебя этой стезей. Но могу сопровождать в пути".

traits.locale_text: "Only by becoming the blood of the flagship does one discover the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide you on that journey. But I can accompany you."
"Only by becoming the blood of the flagship does one discover the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide you on that journey. But I can accompany you."
"You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."
"You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."
"You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."
"You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

languages.text: « Avant d'entrer dans le temple sacré de l'Immortel, vous devez devenir le sang de ce vaisseau amiral. Je ne peux vous guider, mais je peux en revanche vous accompagner. »
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

traits.locale_text: « Avant d'entrer dans le temple sacré de l'Immortel, vous devez devenir le sang de ce vaisseau amiral. Je ne peux vous guider, mais je peux en revanche vous accompagner. »

languages.text: «Debe convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia para poder entrar al sagrado templo del Inmortal. No puedo guiarl{mf|e|a}, pero puedo caminar a su lado».
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

traits.locale_text: «Debe convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia para poder entrar al sagrado templo del Inmortal. No puedo guiarl{mf|e|a}, pero puedo caminar a su lado».

languages.text: “你必须成为旗舰的血脉，才能进入不死之神的圣殿。虽然我不能为你指明道路，但我可以陪伴在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

traits.locale_text: “你必须成为旗舰的血脉，才能进入不死之神的圣殿。虽然我不能为你指明道路，但我可以陪伴在你身边。”

languages.text: 「不滅の者の聖なる神殿に入るには、旗手の血とならなければならない。私はあなたの道を導くことはできないが、あなたのそばを共に歩くことはできます」
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

traits.locale_text: 「不滅の者の聖なる神殿に入るには、旗手の血とならなければならない。私はあなたの道を導くことはできないが、あなたのそばを共に歩くことはできます」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst zum Blut des Flaggschiffs werden, ehe Ihr den heiligen Tempel des Todlosen betreten könnt. Ich kann Euch den Weg nicht weisen, doch ich kann an Eurer Seite wandeln."
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst zum Blut des Flaggschiffs werden, ehe Ihr den heiligen Tempel des Todlosen betreten könnt. Ich kann Euch den Weg nicht weisen, doch ich kann an Eurer Seite wandeln."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in kutsal tapınağına adım atmadan önce sancak gemisinin kanına dönüşmelisin. Bu yolda sana kılavuzluk edemem ama seninle birlikte yürüyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "You must become the blood of the flagship before you can enter the sacred temple of the Undying One. I cannot guide your way, but I can walk by your side."
